page.title: 04Diary 3
page.content: Samantha Ryder I get up at 8.00 open my curtains and look out side on the field and see the horses.Then I go down stairs and usually have chocolate spread.I go out to play then go to get my coat from the garage hearing no cars or traffic.Then I go to school which is only 1 mile up the lane.It is called Coads Green village school.After another good day at school my sister and I walk home from school.On the way we keep to the side incase the occasional car does come past.There is a pavement only a little of the way.When we get home I get the horses in before Mum comes home from work at Plymouth which is 20 miles away.When Mum gets home I go for a ride up to Coads Green turn right down past Penhole then left again up to Coads Green and home.
